two_element_model_three_nodes.png.description: Finite element model with three nodes showing two linear elements with fixed support at node 1

results_two_linear_elements_comparison.p.description: Comparison graphs showing displacement and axial force results for two linear elements versus exact solution with beam schematic inset

n_element_model_generic.png.description: Generic finite element model with N nodes showing multiple linear elements with fixed support at node 1

results_ten_linear_elements_comparison.p.description: Comparison graphs showing displacement and axial force results for ten linear elements versus exact solution with beam schematic inset

results_twenty_linear_elements_compariso.description: Comparison graphs showing displacement and axial force results for twenty linear elements versus exact solution with beam schematic inset

quadratic_element_load_distribution.png.description: Three-node quadratic element showing distributed load projection with nodal forces at nodes A, B, and C

single_quadratic_element_model.png.description: Single quadratic finite element model with three nodes showing fixed support at node 1 and free end at node 3

results_one_quadratic_element_comparison.description: Comparison graphs showing displacement and axial force results for one quadratic element versus exact solution with beam schematic inset

truss_linear_load_fixed_free.png.description: Fixed-free truss element with linearly varying distributed axial load q(x) = q̄x showing fixed support at left end

element_coordinate_system_linear_load.pn.description: Element diagram showing local coordinate system ξ and global coordinate x1 for linearly varying load distribution
